name: Probably I forgot something
description:
Special for Ludum Dare 45, Start with nothing

In this world, everyone has a pocket monster in their pocket. Thanks to the monsters walking on the street have never been more interesting and exciting! Battles, victories, tears of defeat and prize money-all this awaits you in this game unless you have forgotten something... 

Controls: left and right mouse clicks.

THERE ARE MULTIPLE ENDINGS
